---
title: Process Attachment
---

```typescript
import { whopApi } from "@/lib/whop-api";

const result = await whopApi.processAttachment({
	// Required! Autogenerated input type of AnalyzeAttachment
	input: {
		// Required!
		directUploadId: "some string",
		// Required!
		mediaType: "audio" /* Valid values: audio | image | other | video */,
		// Required!
		multipartParts: [
			{
				// Required!
				etag: "some string",
				// Required!
				partNumber: 10,
			},
		],
		multipartUploadId: "some string",
	},
});

```
